ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 203
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, maybe I will head over to the aforementioned places for a buying trip -- someone was trying to sell medium bronze in Oasis the other day for 4pp per AC
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, maybe I will head over to the aforementioned places for a buying trip --
someone was trying to sell medium bronze in Oasis the other day for 4pp per
AC point. ::!!!:: Damn impossible to find in places I can safely go to, at
least on Povar. Maybe I just got bad luck.



Charis

>>I went to the saturday night bazaar and was shocked at the prices people
were paying for bronze! I had actually outfitted a good amount of my own
bronze from High Hold NPCs, and paid less than the poor schmos at the
bazaar! Best check the NPCs around the area, you just may pay less than
from PCs. (The NPCs perhaps truely understand the value of bonze, it's
junk...>>
